info.description: Spring Boot implementation of recruitment task
info.title: Simple Social Networking API

tags.name: twitter-rest-controller
tags.description: REST API of Simple Social Networking

post.summary: Makes User to follow another User. Response contains list of all followed Users

parameters.name: another
parameters.description: Login of Twitter User to be followed

400.description: There was a problem following another User - please follow exception status for details

200.description: The User's followed list was successfully returned

400.description: There was a problem returning the User's following list - please follow exception status for details

get.summary: List Tweets posted by all the Users which User follow in reverse chronological order

200.description: The Tweet list posted by all the Users which User follow was successfully returned

400.description: There was a problem returning the User's Timeline - please follow exception status for details

put.summary: Creates a new Tweet on behalf of the User
put.description: If the User with the given login does not exist, it will be automatically created

400.description: There was a problem creating a Tweet - please follow exception status for details

get.summary: List Tweets of particular User in reverse chronological order

200.description: The User's Tweet list was successfully returned

400.description: There was a problem returning the User's Tweet list - please follow exception status for details

user.description: The User to whom the Tweet belongs
